F.Y.I
This is naturally a "Portable" and "Stealth" application. There's no need to "make" portable.

Here's how:
1. Download installer:
http://www.winaso.com/Download.asp?soft=winaso-registry-optimizer

2. Extract installer with "Universal Extractor".. get a stealth version from here:
http://www.portablefreeware.com/index.php?id=641#21794

3. Copy "{app}" to desired location, rename to your liking... that's the "Portable" and "Stealth" WinASO :)

4. Create a text file and save as "regkey.ini" and put in same folder as WinASO with following info:

[regkey]
400=52612124685463570063

5. To save space, you can delete "WinASO.chm".

6. Tested and verified.. WinASO stores it's settings in "Application.ini", making it "Stealth" and "Portable"...

Enjoy.

Oh yea .. i forgot.. WinASO checks online..

so you have to use the cracked executable or block with firewall.
